auth.forgot_password.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.forgot_password.success_description: We sent an email with further instructions to {email}
auth.forgot_password.title: Forgot password?
auth.login.error_toast.description: Please check your email and password and try again.
auth.login.error_toast.title: Invalid credentials
auth.reset_password.title: Reset password
auth.reset_password.success.description: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now log in with your new password.
